rules.fullName: Field Sourcing - Canada - Corrugated
rules.description: CAN - CORRUGATED - FIELD SOURCING CORRUGATED

rules.fullName: Field Sourcing - Canada - Veritiv Retail Packaging2
rules.description: CAN - CORRUGATED - FIELD SOURCING VERITIV RETAIL PACKAGING VRP

rules.fullName: Field Sourcing - Canada - assign queue
rules.description: CAN - OTHER PKG - CAN SOURCING

rules.fullName: Field Sourcing - Cannabis Work Order
rules.description: Email alert when a Cannabis Work Order is created - put on a delay because there are other workflows that update data and we want this to run last

rules.fullName: Field Sourcing - Intl Pkg - assign queue
rules.description:
When a Field Sourcing work order is created, assign it to a queue based on Segment, country and Intl Pkg flag
12/2017 - change this to send Int'l Pkg to the Packaging queue for that team to evaluate first 10/2021 - excludes 'Sourcing US - Lightning'

rules.fullName: Field Sourcing - Print - Canada - Assign to Queue
rules.description: Assign all CAN, with Print segment to the CAN FIELD SOURCING QUEUE

rules.fullName: Field Sourcing - Print - assign queue
rules.description: CANADA Assign all Print segments to the proper queue, based on the Sourcing Group field

rules.fullName: Field Sourcing - Print - move Print Src Grp to Source Grp
rules.description: CANADA this will run when a sourcing person enters the work order from SFDC and has to select a print Subset group. Skip this if the sourcing field is already updated (which indicates the work order would have come in from the Form Assembly form)

rules.fullName: Field Sourcing - Update Int%27l Pkg field
rules.description: The form does not appear to be updating this flag appropriately in Prod and we've been unable to resolve it, so creating this workflow to update the flag when Int'l Pkg data is filled out

rules.fullName: Field Sourcing - Updated Queue to Other Print
rules.description: CANADA

rules.fullName: Field Sourcing - Updated Queue to Print D%26E
rules.description: CANADA

rules.fullName: Field Sourcing - Updated Sourcing Group to Canada
rules.description: CANADA

rules.fullName: Field Sourcing - Work Order - Change status to Assigned
rules.formula: AND( ISPICKVAL( Status , "New"), LEFT(Owner:Queue.Id,3) <> "00G", ISCHANGED( OwnerId ), OR(RecordType.DeveloperName = "Field_Sourcing", RecordType.DeveloperName = "Equipment_Requests", RecordType.DeveloperName = "CLM_Intake", RecordType.DeveloperName = "RFP_RFQ",RecordType.DeveloperName = "Sourcing_US_Lightning"))

rules.fullName: Field Sourcing - Work Order - Owner is reassigned to Queue
rules.description: Triggers when a work order owner is edited, the status <> "New", and the work order is a queue not a user
rules.formula: AND( NOT(ISPICKVAL( Status , "New")), RecordType.DeveloperName <> "Vendor_Claim", RecordType.DeveloperName <> "Product_Item_Maintance", ISCHANGED( OwnerId ), (BEGINS(OwnerId,"00G")) )

rules.fullName: Field Sourcing - Work Order - Owner is reassigned to User
rules.description: Triggers when a work order owner is edited, the status <> "New", and the work order is an individual user not a queue
rules.formula: AND( NOT(ISPICKVAL( Status , "New")), RecordType.DeveloperName <> "Pricing", RecordType.DeveloperName <> "Vendor_Claim", RecordType.DeveloperName <> "Product_Item_Maintenance", ISCHANGED( OwnerId ), NOT(BEGINS(OwnerId,"00G")) )

rules.fullName: Field Sourcing - Work Order - Status Change Date
Sourcing - Corrugated Work Order - Owner is reassigned to Queue
rules.description: Triggers when a work order owner is edited and the work order is a queue not a user
rules.formula: AND( NOT(PRIORVALUE(OwnerId) = '00G5w000008Xh7e') , RecordType.DeveloperName = "Sourcing_US_Lightning" , ISCHANGED( OwnerId ) , BEGINS(OwnerId,"00G") , INCLUDES(Prod_Categories__c, 'CORRUGATED') )

rules.fullName: Vendor Claim Print - 15%2C 30%2C 60 Day Reminders after Samples Shipped date
rules.description: Time based workflow to trigger 15, 30, & 60 days after the Samples Shipped date has been added.

rules.fullName: Vendor Claim Print - 30%2C 60%2C 90 Day Reminder %28Status Change to In Progress%29
rules.description: Reminders based on status change to In Progress after the Work Order VCP Status = Cancelled,Complete,Complete - Policy Credit,Complete - Denied

rules.fullName: Vendor Claim Print - Email Notification to Rep and Submitter
rules.description: Workflow to send email to Sales rep and person submitting the claim

rules.fullName: Vendor Claim Print - Update Checkbox
rules.description: Used to send email alert based on the day a Print Vendor Claim is changed back to Status = In Process after it was Status = Cancelled, Complete, Complete - Policy Credit, or Complete - Denied.
rules.formula: AND(OR( ISPICKVAL(PRIORVALUE(VCP_Status__c), "Complete"), ISPICKVAL(PRIORVALUE(VCP_Status__c), "Cancelled"), ISPICKVAL(PRIORVALUE(VCP_Status__c), "Complete - Policy Credit"), ISPICKVAL(PRIORVALUE(VCP_Status__c), "Complete - Policy Denied") )&& AND(ISPICKVAL(VCP_Status__c, "In Progress")) )

rules.fullName: Vendor Claim Print - Update VCP Status to NEW
rules.description: VCP team needed different Status selections so created a different field for them to track status - this will update the Status to New when created

rules.fullName: Vendor Claim Print - When Work Order is Complete or Cancelled
rules.description: Updates when VCP Status is Cancelled,Complete,Complete - Policy Credit,Complete - Denied

rules.fullName: Vendor Claim Print Work Order New-1 Hour
rules.description: Vendor Claim Print Work Order was received an hour ago, but is still in a Status of New.

rules.fullName: Vendor Claim for Print - 30%2C 60%2C 90 Day Reminder
rules.description: Reminder sent to Print Mill Claim Owner to follow up on open Mill Claim

rules.fullName: Vendor Claim for Print - Carrier Info has been added
rules.description: Will notify the Vendor Claim Coordinator that owns the Vendor Claim that the shipping carrier information has been added to the Vendor Claim Work Order

rules.fullName: Vendor Claims Print - Update Work Order Owner
zzField Sourcing - Work Order - Completed
rules.description: Update Completed Date
